page.title: 09EDUCATION IN GRANGE/BUTETOWN
page.content:
{The schools in the area: { {1)}Ninian Park Primary School (171752) is a county school with Juniors and Infants. There is a large immigrant population in the school. The headmaster is Mr.V.Noel.
{2)}St.Patrick's R.C.Primary School (175753) is a Catholic school with Juniors and Infants.The school's intake includes some Non-Catholics. The headmistress is Miss.M.Rein.
{3)}St.Mary the Virgin Primary School (187757) is a Church in Wales school with Juniors and Infants. There is quite a high immigrant population in the school. The headmaster is Mr.D.Withers.
